word: ADVENTISTS ARE SOMETIMES PERCEIVED TO BE LEGALISTS. TO SUPPORT THIS CRITICISM INDIVIDUALS WILL POINT TO OUR CHURCH'S DRESS STANDARDS. YET ELLEN WHITE'S COMMENTS ON DRESS DO NOT SUGGEST LEGALISM OF ANY KIND. INSTEAD, THE BASIC ELEMENTS OF THE GOSPEL ARE VIVIDLY PRESENT: HUMILITY, NOT DRAWING ATTENTION TO ONESELF, CONCERN FOR OTHERS’ FEELINGS AND NEEDS, QUALITY, TASTE, NATURAL ELEGANCE. THE QUESTION OF DRESS REVEALS THE FOUNDATION PRINCIPLES OF CHRISTIANITY.
